title: Did a woman survive Titanic, Hendenburg, Pearl Harbor, and September 11?
subtitle: The story of Anna May Dickinson's life, called "the luckiest woman alive," is amazing - and imaginary.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Anna May Dickinson survived a variety of notorious tragedies, including the sinking of Titanic, the explosion of Hendenburg, and the terrorist attacks of 11 September.
